channel.title: Project 2006 | Runescape 2006 Remake | Unique Content
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a5wjiCi.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=5]URL: [url=http://project2006.com]Project 2006[/url] - ONLINE Since September 2014[/SIZE][/B] [U][B]Will there be an iron man mode?[/B][/U] [B][I]Yes, to increase the interest of Project 2006, there will be an iron man mode - however this will be on world-2 as we don't want this to interfere with the main world! - The iron man mode will be a replica of the current old schools Iron Man mode! - Although it will have certains bonuses/tweaks to make it even more fun! [U][B]What is the Exp Rate?[/B][/U] [I][B]The experience rate for Project 2006 is 10x the Runescape's Original rate.[/B][/I]
[U][B]What is Project 2006?[/B][/CENTER] [B][I]Project 2006 is the most developed remake you have ever came across, we've been in development for over 6 months and we've made substantial progress than any other remake in history! But do not take our word for it, let us show you?
We've noticed there are a great amount of aspiring remakes around this area and we can promise you that we're better than any of them put together. We've created and formed a whole staff team from different remakes to create one great, exciting story for you all to indulge in, Project 2006!
Project 2006 has been around for quite some time, we saw this opportunity and saved what is left of the 2006 era, this project has been on-going for over 6 months...
In which all of these developers, creators and managers have come together to make the best, most enjoyable remake to date. You will not be unimpressed.[/I][/B]
[B]Features:[/B] [SPOILER]
[B][U]World:[/U][/B]
Item dropping (global) Pathfinding Clipping (Player movement) Searches (drawers, hay bales, cupboards)
[U][B]Client Features[/B][/U] - Loading full 377 - Auto cache downloader - Auto Client Updater - Full music system (fading music) - Enter to login - Ability to use k/m/b with money - Quick reply option for private messages - Multi platform support - Skillcapes - Maps added - Fast client [U][B]Prayer[/B][/U] - All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate - Zombie Random [U][b]Mining[/b][/U] - Empty and refilling rock's - All ore can be mined - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gem's - Rune essence - Granite - Sand-Stone [U][b]Smithing[/b][/U] - All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct animations, working interfaces & objects [U][b]Fishing[/b][/U] - All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Correct animations [U][b]Cooking[/b][/U] - All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine [U][B]Woodcutting[/B][/U] - Stumps and re-growing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fall chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree - Canoes [U][B]Firemaking[/B][/U] - Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them [U][B]Fletching[/B][/U] - All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all [U][B]Crafting[/B][/U] - Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewellery Moulding [U][B]Thieving[/B][/U] - Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Time [U][b]Runecrafting[/b][/U] - Altar Entering - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss [U][b]Herblore[/b][/U] - All potions makeable - Identifying herbs - Weapon poisoning [U][B]Combat[/B][/U] - PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrow upgrades) - Equipment requirements - Weapon poisoning [U][B]Slayer[/B][/U] - Working slayer gems - Working slayer shop - Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop - Generating task's bound on combat level/slayer level - Remove task forever for slayer points - Cancel task for slayer points - All slayer masters - All slayer masters can give you the slayer location - XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task [U][B]Bosses[/B][/U] -TzTok-Jad -Big Wolf -Chaos Elemental -Count Draynor -Dagannoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagannoth Prime -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon
[U][B]Quests - [url=http://prntscr.com/60n4np]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url][/B][/U] -Cook's Assistant -Doric's Quest -Imp Catcher -Pirates Treasure -Restless Ghost -Rune Mysteries -Sheep Shearer -Vampyre Slayer -Witch's Potion -Gertrudes Cat -Demon Slayer -Dragon Slayer -Prince Ali Rescue -The Knight's Sword -Black Knight's Fortress -Witch's House -Priest in Peril
[B][U] Music & Sounds[/U][/B]
-All skilling sounds -All combat sounds -Working music player and unlocking -Music playing in all regions -Music fade and volume control
[B] Random Events[/B] -Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken - Swarm - Shade - Whirlpool -Random Event Handling System
[B][U] Miscellaneous[/U][/B] - Random event handler that works great with all random events - Skill handler that works great with all skills - Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests - Around 10 random events in place as of now - All skills done to full completion - Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) - Pick-ables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) - Skill interfaces - Pets - Working objects all around the world - Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world - Changelog with 900 changes now - Christmas Crackers - Holiday events handler - Working desert - Single and double doors - Dupe free guarantee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap). - Runescape guilds - All food that runescape had in 2006 - Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only - All runescapes shops that were in 2006 - All runescapes potions - Correct runescape start - Sailing - Gnome Glider - Bank Pins - Correct runescape teleports - Wilderness warning - All rings/amulets loaded - Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req - Tele tabs - Teleother - Lots of minigames - Clipping following/npcs - Empty handler added for items that can be emptied - Crystal Chest - Flour Mill - Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed - Update Cache - Runescape prices - Chat filtering removed due to request on polls. - Running/w energy - Magic Carpet - Skill Guides - 10x Exp Rate - Weapon Poisoning
[B][SIZE=5]Do not think this is all we have to offer, there is much much more, in which will come nearer the future.[/SIZE][/B] [/SPOILER] [B]Video[/B] [SPOILER] [video=youtube;1vp0AWzVq5U]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vp0AWzVq5U[/video] [/SPOILER] [B]Media[/B] [SPOILER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iH22U71.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PzezyQl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ADjmJLZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/9uc7zl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2e2p98g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XkCQ7kh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/261lo41.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ohkbr8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/245brxw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j1wQVD3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WKdgBt0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HKKTxDD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VpKVT5P.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tuqPxpj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nqWGt7W.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R89vstP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bikyGar.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/vzcxzd.png[/img] 2006Scape (Official) Jagex Mod Ali[/CENTER]

item.title: Project 2006 | Runescape 2006 Remake | Unique Content
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

sorecheeny:

Just saying here, if everyone hates your server, then you probably shouldn’t keep it online. -shrugs-

Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

Edit: For the .dat files, I am currently working on what tyb just said - that’s the only best way for now… This isn’t a major issue but will be fixed by next week…

item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:15, topic:550125”][quote author=lardain link=topic=669036.msg4477986#msg4477986 date=1427395067]
Trisidia aint bad. Btw, .dat saving doesnt mean you cant add new things… You can just simply make it add a new save in the .dat files. So I dont see why that would null accounts. Im using .dat myself and beleave me, I added more than just one boolean/int/string to save in the player files. So please learn Java before posting false facts…
OT: Nice server man, I am not a 2006 person myself. But I wish you the best of luck with it.
[/quote]

Oh god.[/quote]

item.title: Project 2006 | Runescape 2006 Remake | Unique Content
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“lardain, post:1, topic:550771”]Trisidia aint bad. Btw, .dat saving doesnt mean you cant add new things… You can just simply make it add a new save in the .dat files. So I dont see why that would null accounts. Im using .dat myself and beleave me, I added more than just one boolean/int/string to save in the player files. So please learn Java before posting false facts…
OT: Nice server man, I am not a 2006 person myself. But I wish you the best of luck with it.[/quote]
Or he could take the smart approach and invest some time in learning how serializing works and allow the data stream to identify which version the saves themselves are so that it can correctly handle them, without causing any issues at all. However Trisidia isn’t that smart.

item.title: Project 2006 | Runescape 2006 Remake | Unique Content
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Leeched 2006Revived source, bad owner/developer, bad admins, bad mods. This server will die simply because they are using the .dat encrypted playersaving method, and that if players want new content, he can’t do that simply because he will null accounts. Adding on to this, the owner doesn’t know anything about Java programming, and whenever players ask him to update something, he “temporarily disables” it.

Don’t play this server guys, it’s not worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project 2006 | Runescape 2006 Remake | Unique Content
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

[CENTER][CENTER]

[B][SIZE=5]URL: Project 2006 - ONLINE Since September 2014[/SIZE][/B]
[U][B]Will there be an iron man mode?[/B][/U]
[B][I]Yes, to increase the interest of Project 2006, there will be an iron man mode - however this will be on world-2 as we don’t want this to interfere with the main world! - The iron man mode will be a replica of the current old schools Iron Man mode! - Although it will have certains bonuses/tweaks to make it even more fun!
[U][B]What is the Exp Rate?[/B][/U]
[I][B]The experience rate for Project 2006 is 10x the Runescape’s Original rate.[/B][/I]

[U][B]What is Project 2006?[/B][/CENTER]
[B][I]Project 2006 is the most developed remake you have ever came across, we’ve been in development for over 6 months and we’ve made substantial progress than any other remake in history! But do not take our word for it, let us show you?

We’ve noticed there are a great amount of aspiring remakes around this area and we can promise you that we’re better than any of them put together.
We’ve created and formed a whole staff team from different remakes to create one great, exciting story for you all to indulge in, Project 2006!

Project 2006 has been around for quite some time, we saw this opportunity and saved what is left of the 2006 era, this project has been on-going for over 6 months…

In which all of these developers, creators and managers have come together to make the best, most enjoyable remake to date.
You will not be unimpressed.[/I][/B]

[B]Features:[/B]
[SPOILER]

[B][U]World:[/U][/B]

Item dropping (global)
Pathfinding
Clipping (Player movement)
Searches (drawers, hay bales, cupboards)

[U][B]Client Features[/B][/U]

  • Loading full 377
  • Auto cache downloader
  • Auto Client Updater
  • Full music system (fading music)
  • Enter to login
  • Ability to use k/m/b with money
  • Quick reply option for private messages
  • Multi platform support
  • Skillcapes
  • Maps added
  • Fast client
    [U][B]Prayer[/B][/U]
  • All bones bury-able
  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
  • Zombie Random
    [U]Mining[/U]
  • Empty and refilling rock’s
  • All ore can be mined
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gem’s
  • Rune essence
  • Granite
  • Sand-Stone
    [U]Smithing[/U]
  • All bars smithable
  • Smelting
  • Correct animations, working interfaces & objects
    [U]Fishing[/U]
  • All fish can be caught
  • Big net fishing
  • Correct item requirements
  • Fishing spots located all around the world
  • Correct animations
    [U]Cooking[/U]
  • All fishes cookable
  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
  • Wine
    [U][B]Woodcutting[/B][/U]
  • Stumps and re-growing trees
  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fall chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Spirit Tree
  • Canoes
    [U][B]Firemaking[/B][/U]
  • Correct anims
  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped
  • Can’t light fires in Bank
  • Can click logs on the ground and light them
    [U][B]Fletching[/B][/U]
  • All logs can be fletched
  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all
    [U][B]Crafting[/B][/U]
  • Gem cutting
  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery
  • Jewellery Moulding
    [U][B]Thieving[/B][/U]
  • Stall Thieving
  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx
  • Correct Respawn Time
    [U]Runecrafting[/U]
  • Altar Entering
  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss
    [U]Herblore[/U]
  • All potions makeable
  • Identifying herbs
  • Weapon poisoning
    [U][B]Combat[/B][/U]
  • PvP fully complete
  • PvN fully complete
  • X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack
  • Equipment effects (i.e. barrow upgrades)
  • Equipment requirements
  • Weapon poisoning
    [U][B]Slayer[/B][/U]
  • Working slayer gems
  • Working slayer shop
  • Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop
  • Generating task’s bound on combat level/slayer level
  • Remove task forever for slayer points
  • Cancel task for slayer points
  • All slayer masters
  • All slayer masters can give you the slayer location
  • XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task
    [U][B]Bosses[/B][/U]
    -TzTok-Jad
    -Big Wolf
    -Chaos Elemental
    -Count Draynor
    -Dagannoth Supreme
    -Dagganoth Rex
    -Dagannoth Prime
    -Giant Mole
    -Gunthor the Brave
    -Kalphite Queen
    -King Black Dragon

[U][B]Quests - Screenshot by Lightshot[/B][/U]
-Cook’s Assistant
-Doric’s Quest
-Imp Catcher
-Pirates Treasure
-Restless Ghost
-Rune Mysteries
-Sheep Shearer
-Vampyre Slayer
-Witch’s Potion
-Gertrudes Cat
-Demon Slayer
-Dragon Slayer
-Prince Ali Rescue
-The Knight’s Sword
-Black Knight’s Fortress
-Witch’s House
-Priest in Peril

[B][U] Music & Sounds[/U][/B]

-All skilling sounds
-All combat sounds
-Working music player and unlocking
-Music playing in all regions
-Music fade and volume control

[B] Random Events[/B]
-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Sand which Lady
-Genie
-Rock Golem
-Spirit Tree
-Zombie
-Evil Chicken

  • Swarm
  • Shade
  • Whirlpool
    -Random Event Handling System

[B][U] Miscellaneous[/U][/B]

  • Random event handler that works great with all random events
  • Skill handler that works great with all skills
  • Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests
  • Around 10 random events in place as of now
  • All skills done to full completion
  • Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)
  • Pick-ables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.)
  • Skill interfaces
  • Pets
  • Working objects all around the world
  • Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world
  • Changelog with 900 changes now
  • Christmas Crackers
  • Holiday events handler
  • Working desert
  • Single and double doors
  • Dupe free guarantee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap).
  • Runescape guilds
  • All food that runescape had in 2006
  • Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only
  • All runescapes shops that were in 2006
  • All runescapes potions
  • Correct runescape start
  • Sailing
  • Gnome Glider
  • Bank Pins
  • Correct runescape teleports
  • Wilderness warning
  • All rings/amulets loaded
  • Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req
  • Tele tabs
  • Teleother
  • Lots of minigames
  • Clipping following/npcs
  • Empty handler added for items that can be emptied
  • Crystal Chest
  • Flour Mill
  • Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed
  • Update Cache
  • Runescape prices
  • Chat filtering removed due to request on polls.
  • Running/w energy
  • Magic Carpet
  • Skill Guides
  • 10x Exp Rate
  • Weapon Poisoning

[B][SIZE=5]Do not think this is all we have to offer, there is much much more, in which will come nearer the future.[/SIZE][/B]
[/SPOILER]
[B]Video[/B]
[SPOILER]
[video=youtube;1vp0AWzVq5U]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vp0AWzVq5U[/video]
[/SPOILER]
[B]Media[/B]
[SPOILER]

















[/SPOILER]

2006Scape (Official)
Jagex
Mod Ali[/CENTER]

Read full topic
